entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of drizzle late this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
